segments.text: Good evening , I have a reservation under the name of Tomlinson .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok I ’ Ve found it . Checking out on the 27th ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I take a credit card for the deposit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sure . Also , I ’ d like a non-smoking room please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly madam . Here ’ s your key . Your room is on the 7th floor and on the left . Room 781 . Check out is at 12 noon .
segments.speaker: S2
